document_data.name: ''Smokeless Torch''
document_data.mainbody: A '''''smokeless torch''''' was a form of illumination used in remote areas of [[Faer√ªn]] such as [[Laothkund]] in the [[Unapproachable East]]{{cite book/Stardeep|45|5}} or [[Adama's Tooth (Monolith)|Adama's Tooth]] in the [[Shining South]].{{cite book/Darkvision|170|18}} In both cases it was found underground, in wizards' abodes, where no expense was spared. Though bright, they generated uneven light.
